name: __ETranslucentSortPolicy
doc: Enumerates available options for the translucency sort policy.

SortByDistance: Sort based on distance from camera centerpoint to bounding sphere centerpoint. (Default, best for 3D games.)
SortByProjectedZ: Sort based on the post-projection Z distance to the camera.
SortAlongAxis: Sort based on the projection onto a fixed axis. (Best for 2D games.)
